<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataMK extends data { const CODE = 'MK'; const PREFIX = 389; const REGION = 'Europe'; const PATTERNS = array( '[2-578]\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:2(?:[23]\d|5[0-24578]|6[01]|82)|3(?:1[3-68]|[23][2-68]|4[23568])|4(?:[23][2-68]|4[3-68]|5[2568]|6[25-8]|7[24-68]|8[4-68]))\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '7(?:(?:[0-25-8]\d|3[2-4]|9[23])\d|4(?:21|60))\d{4}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{5}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '5[02-9]\d{6}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '8(?:0[1-9]|[1-9]\d)\d{5}'=>array( 'shared_cost', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d)(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d{3})(\d)(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
